hibernate-mapping.sql-query: with CATEGORY_LINK(ID, NAME, PARENT_ID, PATH, LEVEL) as ( select ID, NAME, PARENT_ID, '/' || NAME, 0 from CATEGORY where PARENT_ID is null union all select c.ID, c.NAME, c.PARENT_ID, cl.PATH || '/' || c.NAME, cl.LEVEL + 1 from CATEGORY_LINK cl join CATEGORY c on cl.ID = c.PARENT_ID ) select ID, NAME as CAT_NAME, PARENT_ID, PATH, LEVEL from CATEGORY_LINK order by ID
